com.SoftWoehr.FIJI
Class FijiPanelController

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.SoftWoehr.FIJI.FijiPanelController
public class FijiPanelController
extends java.lang.Object

The controller for the FijiPanel. This controller provides methods called by events, and also interaction with application controller.

Version:
$Id: FijiPanelController.java,v 1.1.1.1 2001/08/21 02:38:10 jwoehr Exp $
Author:
jax
